scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin-backend" "npm run dev:admin-frontend"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin-backend && npm run build:admin-frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend-shoppers9 && npm install && cd ../shoppers9-frontend && npm install && cd ../shoppers9-admin-backend && npm install && cd ../shoppers9-admin-frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all
scripts.lint:all: cd backend-shoppers9 && npm run lint; cd ../shoppers9-frontend && npm run lint; cd ../shoppers9-admin-backend && npm run lint; cd ../shoppers9-admin-frontend && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: cd backend-shoppers9 && npm test; cd ../shoppers9-frontend && npm test; cd ../shoppers9-admin-backend && npm test; cd ../shoppers9-admin-frontend && npm test
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
